name: Boatyard Boss
description:
Hi, my name is Kurtanick! I've been learning gamedev for a few months now.

This is my first full-game project. The plan is continue to polish everything up, and release this first level as a demo. Then add more levels and content and post it up on the App and Google Play stores as a full game.

Any feedback is greatly appreciated.

Stay tuned for updates!

Future Features

  • More maps
  • Different Boats
  • Hazards and Obstacles
  • Better Art
  • Sounds
  • More Music
  • Score Leaderboard
  • and more...
